ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *SCAN Log_Entries.Log_Name_U *EQ 'messages' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Log_Path_U *EQ '/var/adm' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *EQ 'error' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *NE 'PAM' ) *OR ( *SCAN Log_Entries.Log_Name_U *EQ 'messages' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Log_Path_U *EQ '/var/log' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *EQ 'error' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *NE 'pam_ldap' *AND *SCAN Log_Entries.Description_U *NE 'PAM' ) )
